title: Chapter I - Waterfront Commission Of New York Harbor
content:
Chapter I - Waterfront Commission Of New York Harbor

State Regulations

Part 1 - General Provisions (§ 1.1 to 1.24)

Part 2 - Pier Superintendents And Hiring Agents (§ 2.1 to 2.14)

Part 3 - Stevedores (§ 3.1 to 3.14)

Part 4 - Longshoremen, Checkers, And Telecommunications System Controllers (§ 4.1 to 4.13)

Part 5 - Port Watchman (§ 5.0)

Part 6 - Application And Revocation Proceedings (§ 6.1 to 6.20)

Part 7 - Hiring Regulations For Registrants

Part 8 - Regularization Of Employment Of Longshoremen And Checkers (decasualization) (§ 8.1 to 8.4)

Part 9 - Assessments (§ 9.1 to 9.6)

Part 10 - Public Loading (§ 10.1 to 10.3)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
